g.text: The request is placed in a state of pending approval
the details of Request saved into Database
An email notification is immediately sent to the manager
shows the request and it's details
The internal state of request is changed to approved
enter an explanation why the request is rejected
The internal state of request is changed to rejected
An email notification is immediately sent to the employee
Choose one of the Requests that its state is "pending for approval"
Employee chooses to withdraw that Request
confirms the desire to withdraw this request
the request is removed from the manager’s list of pending approvals.
an email notification is sent to the manager.
The system updates request state to "Withdrawn"
Choose one of the Requests that its state is "Approved"
enter an explanation why do you cancel the request
an email notification is sent to the manager.
The system updates request state to "Canceled"
redirect Employee to The VTS Home Page
Choose one of the Requests that its state is "pending for approval"
Employee chooses to edit that Request
Display an editable view to the request
Employee can edit title - comments - dates
[Changes.toInformation are correct and have no errors]
redirect Employee to The VTS Home Page
The VTS redisplays the editing page
The VTS highlights and explains all problems
